Class Frame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • Frame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Frame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    The Frame class is a fundamental class of the application it simply initializes a frame with all the panels.
    Since:
    29.05.17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Savev David
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Frame.about_click
      ActionListener which permits to everyone to get some specific information about the APP.
      private static class  Frame.close_click
      ActionListener which permits to everyone to close the APP.
      private static class  Frame.exit_click
      WindowListener which performs some actions when the close button is pressed.
      private static class  Frame.importer_click
      ActionListener which permits to each user to import new cars from a .txt or .dat file.
      private static class  Frame.logout_click
      ActionListener which permits to the user to logout.
